channel.title: Banning item spawning by name?
channel.description: How will I be able to do this? Suppose an item contains the words "Claws", players will not be able to spawn it, whether it be rune claws, or dragon claws. Basically something that compares the ID's with the names.

item.title: Banning item spawning by name?
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

If you don’t know what runescape sucks means, it’d look like this:

public static int claws[] = { ID, ID, ID };

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("item")){ if(command.substring(5) == claws || command.substring(5) == ID/ARRAY){ ... } else { ... } }

Don’t copy and paste this because it won’t work, just an outline.

Read full topic

item.title: Banning item spawning by name?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Why not just use an array?

Read full topic

item.title: Banning item spawning by name?
item.dc:creator: @segaxvi segaxvi
item.description:
@segaxvi wrote:

There is only one way of doing this and thats by going to commands and changing it so only owners/admins can spawn ANYTHING. Meaning mods are left out.

Read full topic
